name: Power Bank 36800mAh Solar Portable Charger with USB-C 5V/3.1A Fast Charging Compatible with iPhone, with 2 LED Flashlights and IPX5 Waterproof External Backup Battery Pack Perfect for Camping, Hiking

name: Solar-Charger-Power-Bank-49800mAh Portable Solar Phone Charger with LED Flashlight/15W Fast Charge USB C Waterproof External Backup Battery Pack for All Cell Phones & Electronic Devices
short_description: 👍 【High-Capacity Power Bank Portable Charger】Features a built-in high-quality lithium polymer battery pack that has passed certifications like UL, CE, FCC, RoHS, and UN38.3. It incorporates a powerful safety system providing temperature protection, over-voltage protection, over-current protection, short-circuit protection, and more. This ensures the safety of both the power bank itself and your connected devices during use.

👍 【15W Fast Charging & Wide Compatibility】This solar power bank features a built-in USB-C port (input/output) and USB-A output ports, enabling simultaneous charging for up to 3 devices. The Solar iPhone Charger is compatible with most USB-powered devices, including iPhones, iPads, Android phones, and more. Additionally, its practicality makes it an excellent gift choice for various occasions and festivals.

👍 【Solar Charger Power Bank for Outdoor Activities】 Equipped with a built-in three-mode LED flashlight (Steady, SOS, Strobe) offering up to 100+ hours of runtime when fully charged. Whether for daily use, travel, emergency preparedness (like hurricanes), or outdoor adventures such as camping, cycling, fishing, hiking, and kayaking, this portable solar charger power bank is an essential addition to your gear bag.

👍 【Using the Flashlight】Turn On (Steady Mode): Press and hold the power button for about 3 seconds.Cycle Modes (When On): Short-press the power button once to activate Strobe mode (rapid flashing). Short-press the button again to activate SOS mode (emergency beacon pattern). Short-press the button a third time to Turn Off the flashlight. Turn Off (From Any Mode): Press and hold the power button for about 3 seconds.

👍 【Power Status Indicators】The power bank features 5 LED indicators: 1 charging indicator and 4 power capacity indicators. A green light signifies solar charging activity, while a blue light indicates USB charging. Pressing the power button instantly displays the remaining battery level, allowing you to easily monitor power and avoid unexpected depletion while on the go.

👍 【Dual Charging Options (USB & Solar)】 This solar power bank can be charged using either a 5V/3A USB adapter or sunlight. Important Note on Solar Charging: While the solar panel provides valuable emergency backup, its small size combined with the power bank's large capacity (49800mAh) means that charging speed is significantly influenced by sunlight intensity and panel efficiency. Fully recharging via solar alone can take a very long time. USB charging is still the primary and recommended method for quicker replenishment of power.

👍 Rugged & Portable Outdoor Design: Designed for the elements, the charging/discharging ports are protected by attached covers, providing waterproof and dustproof capabilities. It also includes a sturdy carabiner clip for easy attachment to backpacks or gear, making it ideal for camping, hiking, travel, cycling, fishing, beach trips, and other adventures.

👍Package Includes: Solar Power Bank, 1x USB Cable, 1x Carabiner Clip, 1x User Manual, and 24-hour friendly customer service. Important Note: Due to its high capacity (49800mAh), this power bank may exceed airline carry-on restrictions for lithium batteries. Always check with your specific airline before flying.
